casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Charudutt J. PATEL, Defendant-Petitioner. C-221 September Term 2018
081069 Supreme Court of New Jersey. OCTOBER 24, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001824-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the petitioner may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before December 24, 2018, and respondent may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before February 7, 2019.
